name: More2Go
description:
More2Go

Wednesday Evnings

St. Paul will be offering meals to go each week on Wednesday nights. Pickup is between 5-6pm at the kitchen located in the back parking lot. Please place your oders by Tuesday of each week by calling the church office number locted below
 
Prices: $8 per Children age 6 and under free.
Pickup Time: 5-6 PM
Dine-In: Please Arrive by 5:30 at the latest
 
Contact the church office at 540-886-2317 for more information
 
Dine In Options
Beginining October 6th-November 10th Dine-In will be avaialble in the familiy life center
 
Small Groups:
Begining October 6th will comence after dinner from 6:15 to 7:30
